subtitleMessage: We make cooperation with inviu.pl easier

login.title: Signing in
login.password-message: If you forget the password, we will send reminder on your e-mail.

pricing.title: Estimate your service now!
pricing.warning: REMEMBER! This is estimated cost. In order to settle final price you need to contact

quot.1st-part: Quality of services is our highest priority. Photosupp system underlines our presence in the world of the newest technologies.
quot.2nd-part: We can help you with choosing a service that suits you the most, without registration!

system-statement.title: Photosupp system provides System Photosupp guidance while taking advantage of inviu's services:

advantage.1st: Help with choosing apriopriate service for your needs and enables you to book a meeting.
advantage.2nd: Provides access to order realisation and verification.
advantage.3rd: Shares the posibility to simply download your product after acceptance from your side!

registration.title: Registration
registration.subtitle: If you have not done it yet, register in order to take advantage of all the possibilities provided by photosupp.
registration.name: Your name
registration.login-message: Log in, in case you are already registered.

client.booking: Thanks to this functionality you can estimate cost of service that you are interested in and make an appointment in suitable time.
client.orders: This funcionality provides preview of all your orders: finished, planned or in progress. When you choose specific order you can check current state of the order, comment on this, verify the product or download the final version of it.
client.scheduler: Preview of the calendar allows you to edit time of planned appointments, previewing all currently unavailable dates.
client.settings: Here you can update your personal data, e-mail address or change the password.

manager.orders: This funcionality provides preview of all your orders: finished, planned or in progress. When you choose specific order you can update state of order, comment the progress, add the preliminary version of product or share the full version of it.
manager.scheduler: Preview of the calendar allows you to edit time of planned appointments, previewing all currently unavailable dates.
manager.settings: Here you can update your personal data, e-mail address or change the password.
manager.users: This functionality allows you to preview all currently registrated users, update role or edit it.
manager.services: Here you can manage all of yours services and create indicators that affects order final price.
